Main Street Outbound

Description:

The Main Street Outbound leaves campus and travels through Main Street in Johnson City & Binghamton and the Pharmacy & Nursing Schools enroute to the University Downtown Center.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:15 A.M. to 9:45 P.M.


Weekends:
Limited evening service - see schedule below.

For daytime service to Main Street in Johnson City please take the Westside Outbound and transfer at Floral Av & Main Street for a BC Transit Route 35 Outbound.
For service to Main Street in Binghamton please take the Westside Outbound.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Main Street Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.
